name: BasePal
description: Base Pal Token is a revolutionary digital currency designed to function on the Base chain platform. Emphasizing the social concept, Base Pal Token aims to become the primary tool for users to reward each other within the Base chain ecosystem. The project leverages the technology and principles of blockchain to create a community-driven currency that fosters social engagement and collaboration. Base Pal Tokens will be used for tipping, rewards, and recognition within the Base chain community.
